name: A Higher Level
effect:
SPEND: Add 4 to your blast destiny.
“Every move looks perfect.”

name: Air Head
effect:
SPEND: Place a card from hand on top of your deck to make a NetNavi +2 until end of next turn.
“You're out of your element, MegaMan.”

name: AirMan: Ready to Blow
effect: Whenever you play a BattleChip, you may return up to 2 resources to their owners' hands.

name: All Natural
effect:
SPEND: Burn 5 power to reveal all cards in your opponent's power gauge and note the total of their destinies. Recharge that much energy.
Elemental battling.

name: Always a Competition
effect:
Spend a yellow resource for no effect to power up 4 times.
“Half gone in one bite. Top that, Dex!”

name: Anubis
effect: Discard a PharaohMan card to make your PharaohMan strength +2 for each resource in play. 7

name: Arashi: Wide Open
effect:
NetOp. Your AirMan is blast -1 for each of your other AirMan cards in play.
“The Ayanos were just a convenient target for us.”

name: Attentive Opponent
effect: SPEND: Discard 4 cards. For each card of a different destiny you discard, each player draws a card and you recharge an energy.
"I don't need a babysitter"

name: Bitten
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card with your NetNavi's emblem to place 2 cards from hand in your power gauge.
Chew up your opponent's strategy.

name: Blizzard
effect: Discard an IceMan card to make your IceMan strength +2 for each card in your opponent's power gauge.

name: Blown Away
effect:
Lose 1 energy for each point of your AirMan's blast and note each destiny. Opponent reveals his or her hand and discards each card with any of those destinies.
MegaMan gets winded. 12

name: Boomer1
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +3.

name: BoysBomb3
effect: Lose 2 energy to make your NetNavi strength +3 for each card in your power gauge.

name: Bring It On
effect:
SPEND: Reduce your ProtoMan's strength by any amount (to a minimum of 0) to reduce his blast by that amount.
“Okay, it's time.” 9

name: Burned
effect:
Make your opponent lose an energy for each resource in play.
“Fear my fire, MegaMan.”

name: Charge Forward
effect:
SPEND: Discard a yellow card to place a card from your discard pile into your power gauge.
Move yourself towards a victory.

name: Chaud: Smooth Operator
effect:
NetOp. Your ProtoMan is defense +1 for each of your other ProtoMan cards in play.
Friend or foe? 11

name: Chip Junkie
effect:
Reveal a random card from your discard pile. If it is a BattleChip, you may play it. This does not count against your BattleChip limit.
“No, not my chips!”

name: Choose Carefully
effect:
Name a card type. Lose energy one card at a time until you lose a card of that type. Take that card into hand.
"I'm only gonna have one shot at this.”

name: Clean 'Em Out
effect:
SPEND: Discard a red card to make your NetNavi defense +3.
“How 'bout we make you wash some dishes?”

name: Collect 'Em All
effect:
Discard 2 cards to make your opponent lose 1 energy for each point of his or her blast destiny.
“The rules of Survival Seven are simple.”

name: Construct a Victory
effect:
Spend a green resource for no effect to draw a card for each card in your opponent's hand.
“Hammer it home, GutsMan.”

name: Correction
effect:
Opponent discards down to 1 card.
“No, it's supposed to delete you.”

name: Counting Down
effect: Look at the cards in your power gauge and replace them in any order. Lore: “And we're going to have a blast.”

name: CustomSword
effect: Discard a ProtoMan card to double your ProtoMan's strength.

name: Dark Admonition
effect:
Lose 2 energy for each point of strength your ProtoMan has to make your opponent lose 5 energy.
“This is not a battle you can win.”

name: Do-Si-Do
effect: SPEND: Dicards 4 cards. For each card of a different destiny you discard, burn an opponent's power and power up.
"Swing your partner round and round!"

name: Dogged Determination
effect:
SPEND: Discard a blue card to cancel a BattleChip.
“I'm going to get MegaMan back into this battle no matter what it takes.”

name: DoublePoint
effect: Burn 2 power to make your NetNavi strength +2 for each BattleChip you play this turn (including this one). You may play another BattleChip.

name: Dr. Hikari, Paternal Hero
effect:
SPEND: Reveal all cards in your power gauge. You may play one, even if it is a resource.
He'll save the day.

name: Enlightenment
effect:
Choose any cards from your hand, power gauge and resources in play and place them beneath your deck.
“Don't be shy. Thrill us with your wisdom.” 8

name: Falling Object
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power to place 2 cards from your discard pile on top of your deck.
“And this is how it all begins!”

name: FastGauge
effect: Whenever you lose an energy, you may draw a card.

name: Flatter Yourself
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card with your NetNavi's emblem to add 4 to your blast destiny.
“I really hate to toot my own horn, but you saw it for yourselves- we really rocked!”

name: Friendly Rivals
effect:
Opponent places each card in his or her power gauge beneath his or her deck.
“I'm gonna put you on ice, Roll.”

name: Full of Hot Air
effect:
SPEND: Place this card on top of your deck.
Whirlwind action.

name: Gaia
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Burn a power to prevent your opponent from playing events and BattleChips.

name: Geddon3
effect: Burn 3 power to make your NetNavi strength +2 for each card in your hand and your opponent's hand.

name: Glide: At Your Service
effect: ALLY. SPEND: Take a card from your deck into hand. Shuffle your deck. Lore: Glide is always obedient.

name: Gloomer
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Make your opponent take a card from his or her discard pile into hand to draw 2 cards.

name: Glow, Baby, Glow
effect:
SPEND: Discard 3 cards to power up 5 times.
Get juiced for battle.

name: GrabRevenge
effect: Whenever you play an event, you may return a resource to its owner's hand.

name: Grave Problem
effect:
Opponent takes all cards in his or her power gauge into hand.
“My spirit awakens.”

name: Guard2
effect: Discard a blue card to make your NetNavi defense +4.

name: Guidance
effect:
SPEND: Place a blue card from hand in your power gauge. Place this card in your power gauge.
“MegaMan, use the power now!” 4

name: Head to Fist
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card and note its destiny. Add that amount to your blast destiny.
Push through the battle.

name: Headstrong NetNavi
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to reduce a NetNavi's strength to 0.
“We're not bowing… to anyone.”

name: HiCannon
effect: Burn a power to make your NetNavi strength +1 for each resource in play.

name: HolyPanel
effect: Whenever you spend a resource, you may recharge an energy.

name: Hot Ice
effect:
SPEND: Place a resource in its owner's power gauge.
“I'm depending on you, IceMan.”

name: IceMan: Deceptively Cool
effect: Whenever you play a resource, you may make your opponent play a card from hand in his or her power gauge.

name: It's Electric
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to burn 3 of an opponent's power.
“This oughta spark up our little game.”

name: Keep Battling
effect: SPEND: If you have no cards in hand, burn a power to draw 4 cards." Lore: “And remember, there's no resting in this game.”

name: Kilby
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Make your opponent take a card from his or her discard pile into hand to recharge 3 energy.

name: Lan: Hot Shot
effect:
NetOp. Your power gauge has one additional position for each of your MegaMan cards in play.
“Right, it's training time. Let's go!”

name: Let's Jam
effect:
SPEND: Burn 2 power to draw 5 cards.
“Finally a chance for some real rock 'n' roll.” 13

name: Liberation
effect: Whenever you burn a power, you make add 3 to your blast destiny. Lore: “And then I will seek my revenge.”

name: Like Father, Like Son
effect:
Return up to 3 resources to their owners' hands.
“A good army can't travel on an empty stomach, right?”

name: Loud and Clear
effect:
Opponent discards down to 3 cards.
“I am the champion! The champion, you hear!” 3

name: Magnum
effect: Discard 2 cards and note their destinies. Add their total value to your NetNavi's strength.

name: Maysa, Staunch Supporter
effect:
You may have an additional resource in play. SPEND: Place any number of your resources in play (including this one) in your power gauge.
“Win one for your family and friends, Lan.”

name: MegaMan: Licensed to Delete
effect:
ALLY. SPEND: Make your opponent lose 3 energy.
“Quick, take my BattleChip license.”

name: Mettaur
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Lose 3 energy to burn an opponent's power.

name: MokoRush1
effect: Whenever your opponent blasts, you may make your NetNavi defense +3.

name: More to Come
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card an note its destiny. Take a card of that destiny into hand from your discard pile.
“Finally, Ms. Millionaire has found something to cure her boredom.”

name: Ms. Millionaire: Politely Evil
effect:
NetOp. Your SnakeMan is strength +1 for each of your other SnakeMan cards in play.
“Surely you're smart enough to see I can't be trusted.”

name: NeoVariable
effect: Discard a MegaMan card and burn 2 powernote the higher destiny. Add that amount to MegaMan's strength twice.

name: Nose Knows
effect:
Add 1 to your blast destiny for each resource in play.
“That smells like food, yummy food.”

name: Open the Door
effect:
SPEND: If you played a BattleChip this turn, add its destiny to your blast destiny.
Door Number Seven, please.

name: Owe You One
effect:
Opponent draws 3 cards and you recharge 3 energy.
“Alright, ProtoMan, I'm sending you in. This is the only way to pay MegaMan back for saving you.”

name: Peace
effect:
SPEND: Lose 2 energy to make a NetNavi blast +2 until end of next turn.
Two for two. 5

name: Permanent Results
effect:
SPEND: Burn a power to make your opponent lose 3 energy.
“I'll delete you both for good.”

name: Petrify
effect:
SPEND: Burn 3 power to burn all of your opponent's power.
“I give you eternal life as a statue.”

name: Playing Hooky
effect:
SPEND: Discard 2 cards to take a card into hand from your deck. Shuffle your deck.
“I must have skipped the day they taught locust attacks in school.”

name: Playtime
effect:
SPEND: Discard a green card to draw 2 cards.
“Bad little dog!”

name: ProtoMan, Unbeatable
effect: Whenever you play a BattleChip, you may add 2 to your blast destiny.

name: ProtoMan: Controlled Fury
effect:
ALLY. SPEND: Make your opponent place each card in hand in his or her power gauge.
ProtoMan cuts loose.

name: Raise the Temp
effect:
SPEND: Place a card from your discard pile on top of your deck.
“Hot mustard, coming up.”

name: Ready, Aim,…
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card with your NetNavi's emblem to burn 2 of an opponent's power.
Fire!

name: Recovery200
effect: Discard 4 cards of the same color to make your NetNavi defense +10.

name: Roll of Thunder
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card to blast. This does not count against your blast limit.
“For your sake, I hope you're lost. Because this part of town is Team Thunder's turf.”

name: Roll: Downtown Chaperone
effect: ALLY. SPEND: Power up twice for each other ally you have in play. Lore: “I’m taking you to NetCity.”

name: Rush: Roll Over
effect: ALLY. SPEND: Place all viruses in play beneath their owners' decks. Lore: “Hey, Rush, call the Mettaur viruses.”

name: Sacred Kingdom
effect: Whenever you are about to lose an energy during battle, you may power up instead. You may only do this once each turn for each of your other PharaohMan cards in play.

name: Shrimpy2
effect:
VIRUS. SPEND: Burn a power to add your NetNavi's defense to your blast destiny.
none 6

name: Silly
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Lose 3 energy to destroy an opponent's resource.

name: Snake
effect: Discard a SnakeMan card to make your SnakeMan defense +3 for each card in hand.

name: Snowed In
effect:
SPEND: Lose an energy to draw 2 cards.
“CyberBlizzard.”

name: Spikey
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Discard a card to play a BattleChip. This does not count against your BattleChip limit.

name: Spin Cycle
effect:
SPEND: Place a card from your power gauge on top of your deck to recharge 2 energy.
Turn the game around.

name: Talking Smack
effect:
SPEND: Make your ProtoMan blast -1.
“I’m not going to be easy on you.”

name: The Way
effect:
SPEND: Discard a card with your NetNavi's emblem to recharge 3 energy.
“Show him the gateway, Roll.”

name: Thrill of Anticipation
effect:
SPEND: Discard a yellow card to burn an opponent's power and power up.
“Yeah, baby, I can't wait to use this thing!”

name: Tory: Rookie NetOp
effect:
NetOp. Whenever you blast, you may place a card from hand in your power gauge for each of your other IceMan cards in play.
Pretty good for a beginner.

name: Ultimate Sacrifice
effect:
Destroy all resources, burn all power and discard all hands.
“Now I will teach you the meaning of supreme power.”

name: Unbelievable!
effect:
Place all BattleChips in your discard pile on top of your deck.
"Well, believe it."

name: Unwavering Loyalty
effect:
Discard a card to make your MegaMan blast -2. Place this card in your power gauge.
“I refuse to hurt her.”

name: Virtual Martyr
effect:
SPEND: Make a NetNavi blast -1 until end of next turn. Place this card in your power gauge.
“I’m willing to do whatever it takes.”

name: Vulcan2
effect: Make your NetNavi strength +3.

name: VulGear
effect: VIRUS. SPEND: Discard a card to add 2 to your blast destiny.

name: Weepers
effect:
SPEND: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may play it, even if it is a resource.
“Finders keepers, loser whatever.”

name: What an Intrusion
effect:
Place all cards in your hand in your power gauge.
“Where on earth are all these things coming from?”

name: WhiteWeb1
effect: Your opponent cannot recharge energy.

name: Wind
effect: Discard an AirMan card to make your AirMan blast -1 and strength +6.
